name: Peas With Garam Masala
keywords: fall, spring, summer, winter, frozen peas, garam masala, whole milk yogurt, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup whole-milk yogurt, preferably sheep's milk

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the oil into a medium saucepan and place over medium-high heat. When it shimmers, add the onion and garum masala and saute until the onion is translucent but not browned, about 5 minutes.
Pour in the peas and cook, stirring, until the peas are warmed through. Remove from heat, fold in the yogurt and season with salt.
